page.title: 02TOWN PLANNING DISPUTES
page.content: {Teignbridge District Council}have decided to sell the 11 acre site at { {Penn Inn}to the{Co-op}for{Â£1.6 {million.}They want to build a{40,000 square foot{supermarket}at Penn Inn which is a{recreation area}that includes an open air swimming pool.The plan has already led to the raising of a{2,000}signature petition of protest. {The Penn Inn Action Committee}have asked their Member of Parliament to set up a{public inquiry}to stop it.{ {The Action Committee}think that the store will cause traffic conjestion, take trade from the town, and deprive children of their recreation area. Another planning wrangle taking place is over plans to extend the out of town shopping complex at{Trago {Mills.}There are fears that this will lead to Newton becoming a ghost town.
